Reviews.original: The artwork demonstrates a good range of line textures, with various elements such as the dragons, birds, and clouds showing different line qualities. The lines are generally well executed, contributing to the overall vibrancy and dynamism of the piece. However, some areas, particularly the human figures, could benefit from more detailed line work to enhance definition and depth.
